name: The Chronicler (Early Alpha)
description:
From Octavi Navarro, creator of the critically acclaimed short games Midnight Scenes, The Librarian, and The Supper, comes The Chronicler, an Open-World RPG inspired by the best classics of the genre.

Enjoy the free Alpha demo and help us create The Chronicler!

  • Purchase the Early Alpha game, 50% off the release price.
  • Get a Steam key when we release on Early Access.
  • Participate in the process of creation and shape the game with your valuable feedback.

(Initially available for Windows only)

Important: The game is in a very early stage of development. We'll keep including new features and content in the coming months with your support (send us your suggestions, feedback, and bug reports through the Community Forums)

Immerse yourself in the enigmatic world of Isola Benedicta, embark on many adventures, meet peculiar characters and fight dangerous creatures.

The finished game will feature:

  • Gorgeous and detailed pixel art.
  • 100+ quests to test your ingenuity.
  • Beautiful music and sound effects.
  • Advance your Chronicler's skills by fighting monsters, cooking delicious meals, fishing, and exploring the huge map.

We hope you enjoy this new adventure!
